protein.general_function: Involved in transferase activity, transferring glycosyl groups
protein.specific_function: Self-glucosylates, via an inter-subunit mechanism, to form an oligosaccharide primer that serves as substrate for glycogen synthase.

reference.reference_text: Mu J, Skurat AV, Roach PJ: Glycogenin-2, a novel self-glucosylating protein involved in liver glycogen biosynthesis. J Biol Chem. 1997 Oct 31;272(44):27589-97.
